activities.name: Select Tables That Require Masking
activities.description: Select tables with rows, a data mapping, and assigned algorithms.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT source_schema, source_database, source_table, metadata, sink_schema, sink_database, sink_table
FROM @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE')} dd
JOIN @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_SOURCE_TO_SINK_MAPPING_TABLE')} am
ON (am.source_database = dd.specified_database AND am.source_schema = dd.specified_schema AND am.source_table = dd.identified_table)
WHERE dd.dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.source_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.sink_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND dd.assigned_algorithm IS NOT NULL
AND dd.assigned_algorithm != ''
AND am.source_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_CATALOG}'
AND am.sink_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_CATALOG}'
AND am.source_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}'
AND am.sink_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_SCHEMA}'
AND dd.row_count IS NOT NULL
AND dd.row_count > 0;

message.value: Failed to mask @{item().source_table} as sink location @{item().sink_database}.@{item().sink_schema}.@{item().sink_table} requires an unsupported writer version @{activity('Get Sink Table Details').output.firstRow.minWriterVersion}

activities.name: Select Tables Without Required Masking
activities.description: Select tables with a data mapping, and no assigned algorithms or rows.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT source_schema, source_database, source_table, metadata, sink_schema, sink_database, sink_table
FROM @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE')} dd
JOIN @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_SOURCE_TO_SINK_MAPPING_TABLE')} am
ON (am.source_database = dd.specified_database AND am.source_schema = dd.specified_schema AND am.source_table = dd.identified_table)
WHERE am.source_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.sink_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.source_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_CATALOG}'
AND am.sink_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_CATALOG}'
AND am.source_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}'
AND am.sink_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_SCHEMA}'
EXCEPT
SELECT DISTINCT source_schema, source_database, source_table, metadata, sink_schema, sink_database, sink_table
FROM @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE')} dd
JOIN @{variables('P_METADATA_SCHEMA')}.@{variables('P_METADATA_SOURCE_TO_SINK_MAPPING_TABLE')} am
ON (am.source_database = dd.specified_database AND am.source_schema = dd.specified_schema AND am.source_table = dd.identified_table)
WHERE dd.dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.source_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND am.sink_dataset = 'DATABRICKS'
AND dd.assigned_algorithm IS NOT NULL
AND dd.assigned_algorithm != ''
AND am.source_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_CATALOG}'
AND am.sink_database = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_CATALOG}'
AND am.source_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SOURCE_SCHEMA}'
AND am.sink_schema = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_SINK_SCHEMA}'
AND dd.row_count IS NOT NULL
AND dd.row_count > 0;

activities.name: For Each Table With No Masking
Get Sink Table Details No Masking
Switch On Copy Methodology And Supported Write

dependsOn.activity: Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking

activities.name: Unable To Use Unsupported Write Version With Data Flow

message.value: Unsupported write version @{activity('Get Sink Table Details No Masking').output.firstRow.minWriterVersion}. Currently supporting up to version @{variables('writerVersion')}

DF_SINK_DELTAPATH.value: '@{concat(json(activity('Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking').output.firstRow.metadata).catalog_path, '/', json(activity('Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking').output.firstRow.metadata).table_path)}'

activities.name: Unable To Use Unsupported Write Version With Activity

message.value: Unsupported write version @{activity('Get Sink Table Details No Masking').output.firstRow.minWriterVersion}. Currently supporting up to version @{variables('writerVersion')}

DS_DELTAPATH.value: @concat(json(activity('Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking').output.firstRow.metadata).catalog_path, '/', json(activity('Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking').output.firstRow.metadata).table_path)

message.value: Unable to proceed, write version was @{activity('Get Sink Table Details No Masking').output.firstRow.minWriterVersion}, compared to @{variables('writerVersion')}, and copy use dataflow was set to @{pipeline().parameters.P_COPY_USE_DATAFLOW}, but could not determine the truth combination of whether this was unsupported or should use a copy dataflow.

activities.name: Get Sink Table Metadata No Masking

dependsOn.activity: Get Sink Table Details No Masking

scriptLines: DataFactoryTypeMapping = concat("'", '(timestamp as date, status as string, message as string, trace_id as string, items as (DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_BATCH_ID as long, ',

transformations.name: WrapValuesInArray
transformations.description: Wrap all columns as an array so that .

transformations.name: AggregateColumnsByBatch
transformations.description: Aggregate columns to be masked by Batch size.

transformations.name: FlattenValuesOutOfArray
transformations.description: Flattening all columns to no longer be an array.

transformations.name: AssertNoFailures
transformations.description: Check if there are any failed request

scriptLines: DF_BODY_TYPE_MAPPING as string ('(timestamp as date, status as string, message as string, trace_id as string, items as (DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_BATCH_ID as long)[])'),

body as (timestamp as date, status as string, message as string, trace_id as string, items as (DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_BATCH_ID as long, LAST_NAME as string, FIRST_NAME as string, EMAIL as string, PHONE as string, STAFF_ID as integer, ACTIVE as integer, STORE_ID as integer, MANAGER_ID as integer)[]),

DCSForAzureAPI assert(expectTrue(toInteger(regexExtract(status, '(\\d+)', 1)) == 200, false, 'Failed_request', null, iif(isNull(body.message), status, concatWS(', ', 'timestamp: ' + toString(body.timestamp), 'status: ' + body.status, 'message: ' + body.message, 'trace_id: ' + body.trace_id))),
